oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Walter Morgan, 1976 September 16, excerpt 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville dentist Walter Morgan, conducted on 16 September 1976 by Ann Wells as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Tennessee Centennial Project. Morgan describes riding the Shooting the Chute ride at the Centennial. The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Morgan, Walter McNairy, 1889-1978--Interviews
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
